item.title: By: Missy
item.dc:creator: Missy
item.description: Sarah! That picture of you is beautiful! And, may I say, very sultry.
item.content:encoded: Sarah! That picture of you is beautiful! And, may I say, very sultry.

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/birchbox-august-2013-review/#comment-377">Sarah Cosper</a>.
It gets streaky and slides all around the place if you touch it. So I wouldn't exactly say it dissolves...migrates is closer to the truth. If you can dry it without touching it, you're okay. I just drank my beer through a straw for the night once I fixed it, just to be safe. I've had other lipstick/stains that held up to water way better, but they also didn't last nearly as long as this one does if it stays dry. Just be careful!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sarah Cosper.

It gets streaky and slides all around the place if you touch it. So I wouldn’t exactly say it dissolves…migrates is closer to the truth. If you can dry it without touching it, you’re okay. I just drank my beer through a straw for the night once I fixed it, just to be safe. I’ve had other lipstick/stains that held up to water way better, but they also didn’t last nearly as long as this one does if it stays dry. Just be careful!

item.title: By: Sarah Cosper
item.dc:creator: Sarah Cosper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/birchbox-august-2013-review/#comment-376">Suzi</a>.
It dissolves in WATER?!?

item.title: By: Suzi
item.dc:creator: Suzi
item.description: That Stila lipstick is so amazing, I have it in Fiery! It's pretty much the only lipstick I can handle because I know it's not flying all over my face throughout the day. Word of warning though, stay the hell away from water when you've got it on...I learned that one the hard way this summer. I was a bridesmaid in my friend's wedding and had my lips perfect, until I got bored, started flipping my bouquet upside down, and then dripped water on my face. I went from Bettie Page to Ronald McDonald immediately. Good haul though!!
item.content:encoded: That Stila lipstick is so amazing, I have it in Fiery! It’s pretty much the only lipstick I can handle because I know it’s not flying all over my face throughout the day. Word of warning though, stay the hell away from water when you’ve got it on…I learned that one the hard way this summer. I was a bridesmaid in my friend’s wedding and had my lips perfect, until I got bored, started flipping my bouquet upside down, and then dripped water on my face. I went from Bettie Page to Ronald McDonald immediately. Good haul though!!
